data.title: by Guy VERHOFSTADT, EP Brexit Coordinator on “Statement following Brexit Steering Group meeting with UK Home Office and 3 million group”, Brussels
data.text:
Press Point - by Guy VERHOFSTADT, EP Brexit Coordinator on “Statement following Brexit Steering Group meeting with UK Home Office and 3 million group”, Brussels - Main contents

Fotograaf: Kevin Bergenhenegouwen

Press point by Guy VERHOFSTADT (ALDE,BE), Parliament's coordinator for the negotiations on the UK withdrawal from the EU following the Brexit Steering Group meeting with the3million representatives and Home Office officials

The European Parliament is the EU's law-making body. It is directly elected by EU voters every 5 years.

What does the Parliament do?

The Parliament has 3 main roles:

Legislative
